title: Homepage Accessibility Test
description: Verify that the homepage at https://exceltic.com/ is accessible and loads correctly
steps: Wait for the page to load completely
expected_results: All elements are visible and properly rendered

title: Basic Navigation Path Test
description: Verify that navigation between key pages works correctly
steps: Find and click on the first link in the navigation menu
Wait for the new page to load
expected_results: Navigation to new page is successful
Back navigation returns to the homepage

title: Blog Post Navigation Test
description: Verify that navigation between blog posts works correctly
steps: Click on a blog post title
Navigate back to the blog list
expected_results: Navigation back to the list works
